casebody.data:
City Court of New York — General Term, May, 1900.

Before Fitzsimons, Ch. J., and Schuchman, J.

William B. Crawford et al., Respondents, v. John Fury, Impleaded, etc., Appellant. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiffs. Early, Heath & Stewart (Henry K. Heath, of counsel), for Appellant; John J. Brady, for Respondents.

Judgment affirmed, with costs. No opinion.
